org.transitime.db.structs

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Immutable
@Embeddable
public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Defines a latitude longitude pair that together specify a location.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distance(Location l2)
      Returns distance in meters between this location and the location l2 passed in.
      double distance(Vector v)
      Returns distance in meters between location and the closest match to the specified Vector.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      If don't have hashCode() and equals() then the objects that include this object will generate a warning when these methods are implemented.
      double getLat() 
      double getLon() 
      int hashCode()
      If don't have hashCode() and equals() then the objects that include this object will generate a warning when these methods are implemented.
      double matchDistanceAlongVector(Vector v)
      Returns length along vector where this location is closest to the vector.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Outputs only "[lat, lon]".

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Outputs only "[lat, lon]". This is a bit different from all the other toString() methods but the nice thing is that then one can just cut & paste a location into a map in order to visualize it.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
